content.webTitle: CD: World review: Buena Vista Social Club, At Carnegie Hall

fields.headline: World review: Buena Vista Social Club, At Carnegie Hall
fields.bodyText: You might think you'd heard all you needed of the Buena Vistas gang – the 1997 classic album sold eight million copies – but this live double album, recorded in July 1998, offers another take on those great songs. It was one of only two concerts by the full ensemble, even while it became clear that they were set to become a global phenomenon.
